text: Approved shop drawings for roof/podium drains, trench drains, and storm piping reviewed and stamped
Drain flow capacity, grate type, and finish matched to location and design intent (traffic-rated, heel-proof)
Coordination confirmed with waterproofing membrane, slab slopes, and landscaping layers
Roof and podium drains installed at low points with proper slope and flashing collars
Membrane clamps secured and strainers installed
Primary and secondary (overflow) drainage installed if required per code
Pipe slopes (minimum 1%) confirmed and consistent with trenching and drawings
Bedding and pipe embedment per CSA B182.1 or local civil spec
Cleanouts, inspection ports, and sump pits located and accessible
Storm leaders and site piping connected with proper couplers and grouting
Trench drain outlets connected with cleanout access
Storm system flushed to storm connection or catch basin
CCTV inspection completed (if specified by AHJ or engineer)
No visible leaks, ponding, or debris at test inspection
